name: Robin to the Rescue
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version by John Shay - Solar Software Limited. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1985. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Original Story: Guide Robin to the Heroic journey through Notthingham Castle, to rescue maid Marian (Marion) from the evil sheriff. You will encounter many hazards, as you scale the castle walls and climb the battlements. Extra guards have been posted, and Robin must collect the keys along the way, to save Marian (Marion) from a mysterious fate. 

You have to guide Robin Hood through 6 chapters to reach your beloved lady. The more points you collect, the bigger you can become a hero. At the end of a chapter, you get bonus points depending on how many lives you have left. 60 points for 3 lives, 40 points for 2 lives and 20 points for 1 life.

Be a hero, be a savior!

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Start the game: Start
Move: Cursor keys
Jump: A

Controls in the browser:

Start the game: Enter
Move: Arrow keys
Jump: Z or ALT 

Original game (Commodore 16/Plus4 ) link: https://plus4world.powweb.com/software/Robin_To_The_Rescue
